Response.Say: Hi officer, this is a care robot calling from Hewitt Hall in the University of New Hampshire. I am caring for a client with dementia who has wandered out of the house just now. Could you please help us find her ASAP. Her full name is Cacy Matthews , she is 74 years old, born in October 6, 1945. She is about 5 feet 10 inch tall, and one fifty pounds. Again, my client has dementia and we need your help ASAP. Please call the care giver at 603-222-9999. Thank you very much! Bye Bye!
